repository_status.note: This is the initial public version of the SharkEyes repository. Some internal components, auxiliary files, and tooling are not yet published and will be added in future updates.

features.description: Implements a Proof of Work system to verify client requests without collecting any personal data, ensuring secure and bot-resistant interactions.
A user-facing CAPTCHA widget that requires explicit interaction to verify the client is human. Only the minimal information necessary for verification is collected, with no personal data used.
An invisible CAPTCHA system running in the background that analyzes user actions and browser data. Only the minimal information necessary for verification is collected, with no personal data used.
